TopicTitle: B9 aero space part subtypes not working

Articles.Content:
hey everyone

im new to ksp and have been tinkering around with it for the past couple of weeks. now im ready for bigger parts.so iv downloaded b9 aerospace pack and have merged its game data with ksp game data and booted the game, the parts loaded in the loading bar.  once in the SPH i can load a basic B9 part and attach it to something but when i try to right click on it no menu comes up. iv tried deleting ksp and the mods and retrying. iv also tried downloading the mod from both github and mods.curse and nothing happened. 

can someone please help.

thanks
